sentences.english: I loved you tenderness and candor.
sentences.chinese: 我曾柔情似水滿懷真摯地愛過你。

sentences.english: It shows how a strong friendship can last through the worst possible times.
sentences.chinese: 這說明一份真摯的友誼可以歷苦難而彌堅。

sentences.english: It was my good fortune to be linked with Madame Curie through twenty years of sublime and unclouded friendship.
sentences.chinese: 我幸運地同居裏夫人有20年崇高而真摯的友誼。

sentences.english: He makes grandiose claims with a mixture of mirth and sincerity.
sentences.chinese: 他會帶着歡笑和真摯要求鉅額索賠。

sentences.english: He sat by the corpse all night, weeping in bitter earnest.
sentences.chinese: 他整夜坐在屍體旁邊，真摯地苦苦悲泣。

sentences.english: The meaning of the sapphire is elegant pure beauty, romantic and sincere happiness.
sentences.chinese: 寶藍色的含義是優雅純潔的美，浪漫真摯的幸福。

sentences.english: My sincere thanks to you, wish you happy in the beautiful, often remain.
sentences.chinese: 對你表示真摯的謝意，願您美麗常在，幸福常存。

sentences.english: Truest friendship fulfills life with enthusiam.
sentences.chinese: 真摯的友誼，使人生溢滿熱情。

sentences.english: My sunny one shines so sincere.
sentences.chinese: 我的陽光一照那樣的真摯。

sentences.english: The words he said were his unfeigned, honest feelings.
sentences.chinese: 他所說的，是沒有任何僞裝的最真摯的感情。

sentences.english: In the meantime, please be assured of our most cordial good wishes and of our desire to be of service.
sentences.chinese: 同時，請服膺我們最真摯的希望和爲您效力的熱看。

sentences.english: And the present Wenjun liquor also is the memory of this beautiful and sincere love.
sentences.chinese: 現在的文君酒也正是紀念了這段美好真摯的愛情。

sentences.english: Pleottom go with my sincere wishes for the New Year. I hope youwillcontinue to enjoy good heingternativeh.
sentences.chinese: 請採取我真摯的新年祝願，順祝身體健康。

sentences.english: That had been a night of unmixed joy and rapture.
sentences.chinese: 那是充滿了真摯的快樂和狂歡的一夜。

sentences.english: Please accept my sincere wishes for the New Year. I hope youwillcontinue to enjoy good health.
sentences.chinese: 請接管我真摯的新年祝福，順祝身體安康。

sentences.english: Sincere friendship is everlasting and unchanging .

definition: to touch/to stir up (trouble or emotions)/to move (sb's emotions or worry)
to move emotionally/to stir up (emotions)/to excite
